org.apache.cocoon.components.language.markup.xsp
Class EsqlConnection

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.apache.cocoon.components.language.markup.xsp.EsqlConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.sql.Connection
Direct Known Subclasses:
EsqlConnectionCocoon2
public class EsqlConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.sql.Connection

This is wrapper to extend a java.sql.Conncetion implementation for easier paging / limit facilities

Author:
Torsten Curdt based on the orginal esql.xsl
